name: disjointed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of words or ideas) not well connected or well ordered: The script was disjointed and hard to follow. Synonym
garbled

Separateness and isolation in space

Add to word list
Add to word list
(esp. of words or ideas) not well connected or well ordered, and therefore often confusing: She gave a disjointed account of getting lost in the woods.
